8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"Hafsah and I were both fasting when we were presented some food that we really wanted, so we ate from it. The Messenger of Allah came, and Hafsah beat me to him - she was the daughter of her father - and she said: 'O Messenger of Allah! We were both fasting when we were presented with some food that we wanted, so we ate from it.' He said: 'Make up another day in its place

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِيجَابِ الْقَضَاءِ عَلَيْهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Reported About: The Obligation On Him To Make Up
